12.content:

You arrived 30 minites before your first class so you go to check out the club room. You knocked on the door and much to your suprise Nelly Raimon answerd. "What Nelly Raimon what are you doing in the soccer club house?" You ask suprised. "What you don't know? I'm one of theyr'e mangers. If you're looking for the other members I'm the only one here right now." She replied. "Oh, well I just dropped by because I wanted to join the club." Nelly looked at you strangly "You really think we have spaces open right now? Didn't hink so." She begins to close the door but you block it with your foot "Wait isn't there anything I can do?" you ask. Nelly smiled a little "Well I could get you in if....
